document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution. Palearctic though not in Scandinavia, Korea , or Japan .

Host plants. On cabbage (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
;
Askari et al . 2009
;
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 a
), turnip, colza, mustard, raddish, other cultivated and wild crucifers (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Populus
sp. ( Salicaceae ),
Tamarix
sp. ( Tamaricaceae ) (
Wagner 1968
), Brassicaceae (Iranipour 1996 ;
Heiss 2002
),
Chenopodium
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ),
Ulmus
sp. ( Ulmaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
),
Brassica campestris
,
Sinapis arvensis
( Brassicaceae ),
Verbena officinalis
( Verbenaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ), lucerne, potato (
Sadeghi et al . 2009
),
Alyssum murale
( Brassicaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2010 a
,
2011
), rape (
Khaghaninia et al . 2010 b
,
2011
),
Alhagi
sp. ( Fabaceae ),
Verbascum
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ),
Sinapis
sp. ( Brassicaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
),
Veronica
sp. ( Scrophulariaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
;
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
),
Lepidium
sp.,
Eruca sativa , Descurainia sophia , Raphanus
sp.,
Erysimum hieraciifolium
(both Brassicaceae ),
Medicago sativa
( Fabaceae ), (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
).
E. ornata
has been mentioned on several plants as Brassicaceae (mainly), Cistaceae , Poaceae and
Solanaceae (
Derjanschi & P√©ricart 2005
)
.

Comments.
Eurydema ornata
is a very variable species for which numerous varieties (with no taxonomic value) have been described: conjunta Kolenati 1846 , falleni Gorski 1852 ,
christophi Jakovlev 1874
, cruentata Puton 1881 , mehadiense Horv√°th 1882 , simplex Rey 1887 , ventrale Rey 1887 , simplicissima Rey 1888 , completa Rey 1888 ,
putonia
d‚ÄôAntessanty 1891 , chloroticum Horv√°th 1891 , pictella Kirkaldy 1909 , gorskiana Kirkaldy 1909 , bipunctata Stichel 1936 , rubra Stichel 1936 , nigrescens Kupka 1944 , atriventris Filippi 1949 ,
ornatula Tamanini 1961
.
